QuestData.Title: Root Cause
QuestData.Description: The massive roots of Shaladrassil are spreading a horrible corruption throughout the forest.$b$bIf we are to save Val'sharah, we will need to find a way to stop the encroachment of the world tree.$b$bIf you bring me enough corrupted root samples, I may be able to discover their secrets.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected the root samples?
QuestData.RewardText: It is as I feared, $r. This corruption is... irreversible.$b$bOur only course of action is to somehow find a way to fight it at its source.
